item.title: Bj√∂rn Brembs
item.description:
I listen to a lot of science podcasts. Pretty much daily. Depending on how much I travel, it can be up to 5-10 hours a week.
Synaptic is a fantastic podcast from @thetransmitter that blows most other science podcasts out of the water, not just in terms of production value but in particular in intellectual depth and breadth.
So this is a must-listen for anybody who is into #neuroscience https://www.thetransmitter.org/podcasts/I just went and subscribed to their other podcasts, too.Hat-tip: @NicoleCRust

item.title: kravietz ü¶á
item.description: #Ukraine incursion into #Kursk oblast‚Äô had one interesting added benefit, which was obtaining access to secret FSB archives in Sudzha. FSB was evacuating in such haste that they did not manage to destroy their archives, which were acquired intact and now journalist Dmytro ‚ÄúApostol‚Äù Karpenko is publishing some of them.As Estonian analyst Artur Rehi wrote on Twitter, the most interesting thing about the documents is the unbelievable amount of bullshit produced from the very bottom to the very top of FSB. The service whose main purpose is to collect accurate, actionable intelligence internally and abroad is mass scale producing fantasies, certifying them as ‚Äúreliable intelligence‚Äù and inventing whole massive plots, on a scale that would probably beat Hollywood screenplay writers union.One of the cases is based on confidential reports from agent ‚ÄúMizer‚Äù who, according to the FSB document is a 1973 born male, living in Mokrushino in Kursk oblast‚Äô whose ‚Äúoperational value‚Äù is that he ‚Äúcan travel to subjects of Russian Federation, specifically Donetsk People‚Äôs Republic‚Äù due to the job he‚Äôs doing.Attached is his hand-written report where he describes a rather delusional story of ‚Äúyouth camps‚Äù where ominous ‚ÄúAzov‚Äù soldiers train them into becoming assassins, all supervised by ‚Äúinstructors from France, UK, Belarus and Latvia‚Äù etc etc. The report is described as ‚Äúreliable information‚Äù, whereas any sane person would ask themselves how this knowledge could be acquired by a person that is only allowed to travel to DPR‚Ä¶ which is certainly quite far and isolated from all the places where the ‚Äúcamps‚Äù are described to be happening. At the same time, the report very much looks like it‚Äôs just rambling compiled from random stories taken from Russian TV, which were likely based on other such reports etc etc.Plenty more documents are posted on ‚ÄúApostle‚Äù Telegram https://t.me/ApostleDmytro/62 and on his YouTube https://www.youtube.com/@dmytrokarpenko/videos

item.title: J√∂rg Volbers
item.description: @dbellingradt Been there; 8 Jahre befristete Stellen mit einer venia in Philosophie. Die ich jetzt wohl abgeben werde. Seit diesem Sommer bin ich "raus" aus #academia, und ich merke jetzt erst, was f√ºr ein Gef√§ngnis es war. Tolle Themen, intellektuelle Selbstverwirklichung, jajaja, aber zu meiner gro√üen Freude und Erleichterung gibt's das auch anderswo. Halt anders. Aber daf√ºr anst√§ndig entlohnt, ohne diese st√§ndige Entwertung der Befristung, mit klaren Aufgaben, und am allerbesten: Feierabende!

item.title: Aktionsb. neue Soziale Medien
item.description:
Der #eXit ist machbar. Diese Organisationen stehen zu ihren #Werten und lassen sich nicht kirre machen vom vorgeblichen #Reichweite-Verlust. Bravo, #eXiters. Ihr seid ein gro√üartiges Vorbild! üëç üéâ
Teilt dieses Bild bitte auch auf anderen Plattformen, um zu zeigen, dass es immer mehr werden.
Weitere #eXiters bei #byebyeelon unter https://byebyeelon.de #UnisInsFediverse üë®‚Äçüéì üåª üë©‚Äçüéì Holen wir uns #UnserInternet zur√ºck #Jemandenvergessen? #EinfachBescheidsagen

item.title: Laffy
item.description: 2/ Angry Staffer: A Russian intelligence operative was apparently in direct negotiations with Lauren Chen and Liam Donovan over how much to pay Benny Johnson and Tim Pool.
